nodes.text: A Hutt attended a reception on Grand Moff Lynch Hauser's personal Star Destroyer. A rarity amongst the Hutt, this individual had hair, which he or she would style in locks.

This Hutt appeared in background scene in the first issue of the Star Wars: River of Chaos series. Like Zorba Desilijic Tiure and his brother Pazda, this Hutt possessed hair, which was due to a recessive genetic trait.
